articles.content: Having spent four years working as an economist in the Treasury under George Osborne, Mr Jones joined the Department for Exiting in the European Union in 2016 before joining the Europe Unit two years… [+888 chars]

articles.title: Dave Grohl Recalls Visiting Lemmy's 'Disgusting' Home - Ultimate Classic Rock

articles.content: Dave Grohl vividly recalled visiting Lemmy Kilmister at the Motorhead bassist's cluttered Los Angeles apartment. “I was shocked at how fucking disgusting it was,” the Foo Fighters frontman said in an… [+1482 chars]

articles.content:
